headline: IGL Bonus Issue: CGD Indraprastha Gas board to consider free issue of shares; record date to be fixed on THIS day
body: The board of Indraprastha Gas Limited (IGL) is set to deliberate on a bonus share issuance at its upcoming meeting on December 10, 2024. This announcement has sparked interest among investors, as bonus issues typically reward existing shareholders. The move aligns with IGL's ongoing efforts to strengthen shareholder confidence and enhance its market presence. Analysts expect the company to discuss a favorable bonus ratio, which could lead to increased trading activity around the stock. The decision will also take into account the company’s financial performance and future expansion plans.

headline: Swan Energy stock hits 3-month high with 15% jump, zooms 53% in 6 weeks
body: Swan Energy has been on a remarkable upward trajectory, recording a 15% increase in stock value within the past three months and a staggering 53% rise over the last six weeks. This surge follows the company's announcement regarding the resumption of operations at its shipyard, formerly known as Reliance Naval and Engineering. The strategic move is expected to unlock significant value for stakeholders, as the shipyard could play a pivotal role in expanding Swan Energy's market footprint. Industry experts are optimistic about the company’s future, with potential for further stock price appreciation.

headline: With 12 per cent market share, Delhi has become the EV Capital of India: Atishi CM, Delhi
body: Delhi has emerged as the Electric Vehicle (EV) capital of India, accounting for 12% of the country’s EV market share, according to Chief Minister Atishi Marlena. The city’s progressive policies, such as EV subsidies and infrastructure development, have played a crucial role in this achievement. Public awareness campaigns have also boosted EV adoption among residents, aligning with Delhi’s commitment to reducing carbon emissions. Experts believe this milestone sets a benchmark for other Indian cities aiming to accelerate their EV adoption rates.
